about_the_game:
Welcome to "Puzzled Hive", a simple-styled puzzle game set in a beehive. In this game, you will take on the role of Meo, exploring mysterious places with the help of Noth to uncover answers. Will you choose to leave?

Demo Version

Currently, full controller support is not available (UI cannot be controlled with a controller).

We have completed the Demo (Version 0.2), which includes:

• A basic art style has been established, with all materials hand-drawn, giving a simple and clean overall style.

• Mechanism of switching between multiple floors.

• Explore with your companion Noth.

• A variety of puzzles created with multiple mechanisms.

Full Version Prospects

Due to time constraints, the map design of Demo 0.2 does not meet our expectations. The official version will include more puzzle mechanisms, enriched maze puzzles, scenes with diverse styles, more NPCs, and a completed storyline. If you like the adorable Meo and Noth, or if you love playing 2D puzzle games, please don't miss it!

Words from the Developers

Hello! We are Player Links Players (PLP, which means "drifting bottle" in Chinese), a studio currently working on our first indie game. Although there are still many shortcomings at this moment, it's just the beginning. In the official version, we will do our best to create an interesting game! And special thanks for Vira Lee, who created bgm for Puzzled Hive!

Contact us

We will welcome any idea or suggestion. You can find us via:

• Bilibili: 深名五介是在下（will update my developing progress here）

• QQ group: 930475923

• Email: 1163684623@qq.com/shenmingwujiegojiu@gmail.com

A picture of me with Meo and Noth drawn by my friend EZ to celebrate the demo launch!

Thank you for supporting, and we are looking forward for your experience in Puzzled Hive!
